topic.title: Deploying Monitor on Standalone Independent Node

body.p: HOS 2.0 recommends 3 monitor deployment for production setup. As monitor is more of CPU and RAM sensitive only and does not any storage, we do recommend deployment of monitor on controller node itself instead of deploying it on standalone nodes. It will help in effective utilization of nodes. However if customer wants, he can choose to deploy monitor on independent node instead on controller node.

Reasons can be one of the below or something else:
Need to have more than 3 monitor nodes or,
Do not want to mix services running on controller nodes with monitor service of ceph
Customer can achieve so by modifying cloud input model and treating monitor nodes as resource nodes. Please node that we do not support deployment transition i.e. customer can not deploy monitor on controller node day-1 and later migrate to standalone node. He or she needs to decide upfront before deploying ceph.
